wizard.title: Appointment Booking Wizard
wizard.description: Follow these steps to book your appointment

step0.title: Branch
step0.description: Select the branch where you want to be served
step0.subtitle: Which branch would you like to visit?
step0.instruction: Select the branch that is most convenient for your appointment

step1.title: Service
step1.subtitle: What service do you need?
step1.instruction: Select the service for which you want to schedule an appointment

step2.title: Date & Time
step2.description: Choose when you want your appointment
step2.subtitle: When would you like your appointment?
step2.instruction: Select the date and time that best fits your schedule

step3.title: Form
step3.subtitle: Complete additional information
step3.instruction: Please fill out the form with the required information for your appointment

step4.title: Confirmation
step4.subtitle: All set!
step4.instruction: Review your appointment details and confirm the booking

step5.title: Appointment Created Successfully!
step5.subtitle: Your appointment has been confirmed. You can use the QR code or confirmation code for check-in.

export.description: Report is being exported in {{format}} format

tooltips.averageWaitTime: Average time users wait before being served. Calculated by summing all wait times and dividing by the total number of attentions.
tooltips.totalAttentions: Total number of users who were served during the selected period. Includes all successfully completed attentions.
tooltips.medianWaitTime: Wait time that is exactly in the middle when all times are sorted from lowest to highest. Useful for understanding typical wait time without being affected by extreme values.
tooltips.efficiency: Percentage of attentions that were completed within the target time. Higher values indicate better system performance.
tooltips.onTime: Percentage of users who were served within the established target time. Complementary to the 'Exceeds Target' metric.

emergencyModeInfo.description: Emergency mode temporarily modifies the branch operation for critical situations. The following changes will take effect:

changes.relaxedRestrictions: Time restrictions for cancellations and rescheduling are relaxed
changes.priorityScheduling: Emergency appointments are prioritized in the schedule
changes.auditLog: All actions are recorded in the audit log

emergencyModeInfo.warning: This mode should only be used for actual emergency situations and will be audited.
